rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming vestibule with natural stone accents that adhere to Vastu by aligning the entrance on the east side.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living space combining a seating area and entertainment zone, incorporating Bohemian decor with eclectic furniture, vibrant textiles, and artisanal fixtures.

rooms.description: A spacious kitchen integrated into the living area, featuring modern appliances, an island counter for casual dining, and a decorative backsplash. Designed with natural lighting in mind to adhere to Vastu guidelines for positive energy.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A private master bedroom designed with Bohemian influences - think bold colors, patterned rugs, and artistic decor. The room is oriented eastward following Vastu for optimal energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom featuring a minimalist design with touches of Bohemian style through vibrant cushions and wall art.

rooms.name: Bathroom 1 (en suite to Master)
rooms.description: An en-suite bathroom designed for comfort, incorporating natural materials and warm lighting. The placement is in accordance with Vastu by avoiding the northwest corner.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: A classic wooden door that leads directly into the entrance hall, placed on the east side to enhance positive energy according to Vastu.

openings.name: Window
openings.description: Large windows strategically placed in the living area and kitchen for ample natural light. These openings are designed to adhere to Vastu principles by maximizing exposure to the east or south.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: A cozy bedroom with Bohemian decor and natural elements, oriented for optimal Vastu compliance.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: A dedicated workout space featuring modern gym equipment, ambient lighting, and natural ventilation. The placement respects local building norms while offering privacy and functionality.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A secure staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor, designed with safety and Vastu in mind by aligning it centrally.
